message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this product which I believe you'll find very valuable. I'm asking for $9,500.  I think it's a fair price considering the benefits it will bring to you.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I'm hoping to stay within my budget. Would you consider lowering the price to $8,500?
Hi Bob, I understand you're looking for a good deal.  While I value this product highly, I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  I believe this price reflects the true worth of what's being offered.
Hello Alice, thank you for adjusting your offer. I appreciate the effort. Could we discuss a price closer to $8,000? I believe this would better align with my budget.
